Posts.Content: Thanks for replying two years on my arm still numb and foot the right one I still can't walk far and get tired  my eyes went blue round the rim  I suppose they will stay that colour naturally they are hazel  I still get pain on the left side were I had my operation  now my right arms got a frozen shoulder  ljust call it my war wounds.  The chemo and radiotherapy takes its toll on your body that's because it the most worst thing on earth now l just take one day at a time
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men

Posts.Content: Paul I had breast cancer I hope every thing is OK 2012 I had mine chemo radiotherapy operation when I was young I always worried now I'm older I just take one day at a time itputs life in a different perspective keep strong I made it my enemy once again hope your OK this is the first time I have actually done this
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men
